languages.text: "Из глубин мертвого камня, заточенный в холодный металл, Он воспрянет, и час этот близок!"
"From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"
languages.original_text: "Из глубин мертвого камня, заточенный в холодный металл, Он воспрянет, и час этот близок!"

traits.locale_text: "From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"
"From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"
"From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"
"From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"
"From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"
"From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"

languages.text: "Aus den Tiefen des toten Steins, aus seinem Gefängnis aus kaltem Metall, wird er sich erheben — die Stunde naht!"
languages.original_text: "From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"

traits.locale_text: "Aus den Tiefen des toten Steins, aus seinem Gefängnis aus kaltem Metall, wird er sich erheben "- die Stunde naht!"

languages.text: « Des profondeurs de la pierre morte, de Sa prison de métal froid, Il se relèvera... L'heure est proche ! »
languages.original_text: "From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"

traits.locale_text: « Des profondeurs de la pierre morte, de Sa prison de métal froid, Il se relèvera... L'heure est proche ! »

languages.text: “从死寂的岩石深处，从他的冰冷囚牢中，他将再度崛起！时刻即将到来！”
languages.original_text: "From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"

traits.locale_text: “从死寂的岩石深处，从他的冰冷囚牢中，他将再度崛起！时刻即将到来！”

languages.text: 「死に石の奥底から、冷たい金属の牢獄から、あの方は蘇る…その時は近い！」
languages.original_text: "From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"

traits.locale_text: 「死に石の奥底から、冷たい金属の牢獄から、あの方は蘇る…その時は近い！」

languages.text: «De las profundidades de piedra muerta, de su prisión de frío metal, resucitará. ¡la hora está cerca!».
languages.original_text: "From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"

traits.locale_text: «De las profundidades de piedra muerta, de su prisión de frío metal, resucitará. ¡la hora está cerca!».

languages.text: "Ölü taşın derinliklerinden, buz gibi hapishanesinden zuhur edecek. Vakit geldi çattı!"
languages.original_text: "From the depths of dead stone, from His prison of cold metal, He will rise — the hour is nigh!"

traits.locale_text: "Ölü kayanın derinliklerindeki buz gibi metal mahzeninden ansızın zuhur edecektir. Vakit yakındır!"
